content: Oh! I sat down just to skim over this and found it impossible. I couldn’t ‘skim’ I had to read each word carefully.Am I a ‘Defective’ or a ‘Deserving’? I don’t know but I do know I would be sweating blood trying to decide on my twenty.I really enjoyed this and now I’m going to go and open all of my windows!Thank you, Felicia.
